Articles.Content:
Just realised that I hadn\'t Created on of these Topics. and I have been feeling a little left out.

So here it is

Hey

I\'m Damonjay

I have been playing since 0.8.5

Im a fanatic fan of KSP. if i\'m not playing then Im on the forum (or both).

I love the challenges and I love the discussions so keep posting!

keep boosting!

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

PS: Yeah yeah, I know you\'re not a noob her, but a welcome is a welcome. 8)

PS: Yeah yeah, I know you\'re not a noob her, but a welcome is a welcome. 8)

Well i would hope you would recognise my name at least besides the friendly atmosphere we have in this forum is amazing!

... besides the friendly atmosphere we have in this forum is amazing!

That\'s exactly what I am trying to foster here. A healthy community can go a long way to customer satisfaction and it starts at the forums.

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky
Well your doing a good job at it Sordid and I have been trying to help

...Sordid and I have been trying to help

Well, yeah, but you two need to be more original. Copying what I say is flattering and all, but please, stop using my greeting. :

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky
